name: jalkiohjauskirje
styles: @page {    size: 210mm 297mm;    margin: 16mm 10mm 30mm 12mm;@bottom-center {		vertical-align: top;		content: element(footer);	}    }@font-face {    font-family: Calibri;    font-size: 12px;    src: url(classpath:/fonts/Calibri.ttf);    -fs-pdf-font-embed: embed;    -fs-pdf-font-encoding: ISO-8859-15;}koekutsubody {    font-size: 14px;    font-family: Calibri;    margin: 0 0 0 11mm;}body {    font-size: 12px;    font-family: Calibri;    margin: 0;}.koekutsuheader {    font-size: 14px;    font-family: Calibri;	margin: 4mm 0 0 11mm;    height: 50mm;    width: 100mm;    float: left;}.header {    margin: 4mm 0 0 11mm;    height: 80mm;    width: 100mm;    float: left;}.organisaatio {    width: 80mm;    height: 26mm;    margin: 0;    padding: 0;}.osoitetarra {    width: 70mm;    height: 37mm;    margin: 0;    padding: 0;}.koekutsuosoitetarra {    font-size: 14px;    font-family: Calibri;	width: 70mm;    height: 37mm;    margin: 0;    padding: 0;}.lahetysMerkinta {    font-size: 90%;}.asiakirjanTyyppi {    float: left;    text-align: left;    width: 60mm;    margin: 4mm 0 0 0mm;}.koekutsukirjeenpaivays {	font-size: 14px;    font-family: Calibri;	margin-top: 50px;    margin-left: 500px;}.jalkiohjauskirjeTyyppi {    text-align: center;}p {    padding-bottom: 0;    margin-bottom: 0;}.koekutsuasiaotsikko {	font-size: 14px;    font-family: Calibri;	margin:  15mm 0 0 11mm;    clear: both;    font-weight: bold;}.asiaotsikko {    clear: both;}.sisalto {    clear: both;    line-height: 140%;}.koekutsusisalto {	font-size: 14px;    font-family: Calibri;	margin:  15mm 0 0 11mm;	clear: both;    line-height: 140%;}.liiteSisalto {    font-size: 11px;    line-height: 140%;}table {    border-collapse: collapse;}td, th {    border: 1px solid gray;    padding: 5px;}td {    text-align: center;}.hakutoive {    text-align: left;}.koekutsuhakukohde {	font-size: 14px;    font-family: Calibri;    margin: 5mm 0 0 11mm;    text-align: left;    font-weight: bold;}th {    vertical-align: top;    text-align: center;}ol, ul {    padding-top: 0;    margin-top: 0;    font-weight: 100;    padding-left: 4mm;    margin-left: 2em;}ul.dash {    list-style: none;    margin-left: 0;    padding-left: 1em;}ul.dash li:before {    display: inline-block;    content: "-";    width: 1em;    margin-left: -1em;}.footer {    font-size: 90%;    position: running(footer);}.footer .heading {    width: 100%;}.footer div {    float: left;    width: 30mm;}
